short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces references to the referendum with Beiber vs. One Direction stuff.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sick to death of the Scottish Independence Referendum? Twitter full of #indyref tweets you'd rather not see? Simply install this extension and you'll think everyone is talking about who's better out of Justin Bieber and One Direction.
